member.name: RID_DEVICE_INFO_KEYBOARD
member.summary: Defines the raw input data coming from the specified keyboard.

summary.para: The type of keyboard. See Remarks.

| Value | Description | |:-----:|------------------------------------------------------| | 0x4 | Enhanced 101- or 102-key keyboards (and compatibles) | | 0x7 | Japanese Keyboard | | 0x8 | Korean Keyboard | | 0x51 | Unknown type or HID keyboard |

member.name: RID_DEVICE_INFO_KEYBOARD.dwSubType
member.summary: The vendor-specific subtype of the keyboard. See Remarks.

member.name: RID_DEVICE_INFO_KEYBOARD.dwKeyboardMode
member.summary: The scan code mode. Usually 1, which means that Scan Code Set 1 is used. See Keyboard Scan Code Specification.

member.name: RID_DEVICE_INFO_KEYBOARD.dwNumberOfFunctionKeys
member.summary: The number of function keys on the keyboard.

member.name: RID_DEVICE_INFO_KEYBOARD.dwNumberOfIndicators
member.summary: The number of LED indicators on the keyboard.

member.name: RID_DEVICE_INFO_KEYBOARD.dwNumberOfKeysTotal
member.summary: The total number of keys on the keyboard.
